description: Cawthon Bee  was with  Jim Mauritzen  and  8 others . To the one that I have never met in person, but has made such an amazing difference in not only my life, but in SOOO many others, I truly hope you have the most amazing birthday ever.  After I did my DNA, only knowing I would know my ethnic origins, I am so happy you took me under your wing and am SO happy to have you in my life! You found my paternal roots, as an adoptee who is loved so much by her adoptive family, who just wanted to know where I came from and my medical background, I received so much more.  I have met so many amazing biological family members along the way, not only my own, but other adoptee's family members who never knew we existed, and you were there for us every step of the way! I am slowly building trees for my mom and the hubby too.  And we DO have a lot of fun in the meantime!  ;)  Happy Birthday angel Jan!
